item.title: Trump to visit Federal Reserve, escalating campaign against Chair Powell
item.description: This is the first time in nearly two decades that an American president will be making an official trip to the central bank.

item.title: With no guarantee of an EU-U.S. trade deal, Europe keeps its retaliation options open
item.description: A trade agreement between the European Union and U.S. could be imminent, but nothing is guaranteed.

item.title: Trump was told his name was in Jeffrey Epstein files before DOJ withheld documents: WSJ
item.description: President Donald Trump was friends with Jeffrey Epstein for years before the two men had a falling-out.

item.title: Republican senators join Dems on bill to exempt small businesses from Trump's Canada tariffs
